There are currently no rules for this account. Add some rules for this account using the action button below. 

A rule has conditions and outcomes. 

When a rule's conditions are satisfied, DKB then transforms its outcomes into recommendations.

To generate recommendations, create and run rules. 

Each rule will test reddit for its conditions - and if they are satisfied, it will use the rule's outcomes to create recommendations for you that appear here. 

You can then choose to enact those recommendations.
